solution_line_template: The boys brought a total of {num_boys} x {sticks_per_boy} = <<{num_boys}*{sticks_per_boy}={total_boys_sticks}>>{total_boys_sticks} popsicle sticks.
The girls brought a total of {num_girls} x {sticks_per_girl} = <<{num_girls}*{sticks_per_girl}={total_girls_sticks}>>{total_girls_sticks} popsicle sticks.
Therefore, the girls brought {total_boys_sticks} - {total_girls_sticks} = <<{total_boys_sticks}-{total_girls_sticks}={difference_sticks}>>{difference_sticks} fewer popsicle sticks than the boys.
